column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////I had brunch here a week ago
column2: and it was one of the best. The pumpkin croissant was INCREDIBLE. The dollop of filling in the middle was perfectly sweetened. The pistachio one was very good as well
column6: and textures were all on point. My Croque Madame was incredibly satisfying (the gherkins on the side were too acidic and unnecessary)
column7: as were my boyfriend's Biscuits and Gravy
column9: leaving little more than a crumb behind. The mocha was a little funky. I don't recommend that so much
column10: but the Nutella latte my boyfriend ordered was AWESOME
column11: and I'm not even a big Nutella guy. Will definitely come again.
